data.comment: Marcelo Rangel (Goias) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match has started.
Jefferson Goias.
In the minute 6, The match at Serra Dourada has been interrupted briefly for a check on Marcos Guilherme, who is down injured.
Free kick Internacional.
Marcos Guilherme has recovered and rejoins the match in Goiania.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 9, Marcos Guilherme, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Gabriel Boschilia is the substitute for Internacional.
In the minute 10, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Daniel Villalva with Caju.
Andres D'Alessandro of Internacional is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Goias.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza blows against Goias's Rafael Moura for offside.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Tadeu.
Goias's Tadeu looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 23, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a throw-in for Internacional, close to Goias's area.
Goias needs to be cautious. Internacional have an attacking throw-in.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 24, Goias to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Free kick in a good position for Internacional!
Fabio Sanches (Goias) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 26, Andres D'Alessandro of Internacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 27, Victor Cuesta is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goias's half?
Victor Cuesta is back on his feet again.
In the minute 32, Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Internacional drive upfield and Gabriel Boschilia gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goias defender.
In the minute 35, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Internacional have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 37, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
In the minute 39, Goias have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Goiania.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 43, Goias will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Internacional.
Internacional's Edenilson attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Goias a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Goias.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 45, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza blows to end the first-half.
Vinicius Lopes puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Victor Cuesta (Internacional) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
At Serra Dourada, Praxedes for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Rafael Moura (Goias) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Eduardo Coudet is making the team's second substitution at Serra Dourada with Thiago Galhardo replacing Praxedes.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Breno is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 52, Internacional's Andres D'Alessandro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Goias a goal kick.
Goias's Breno is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Goias.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Internacional's Moises breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Pedro Henrique (Internacional) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 64, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tadeu for Goias who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Tadeu is back on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 65, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Pedro Henrique (Internacional) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 67, In Goiania Goias attack through Vinicius Lopes. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Internacional close to the penalty box.
The away team have replaced Andres D'Alessandro with Rodrigo Lindoso. This is the third substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
Eduardo Coudet (Internacional) is making a fourth substitution, with Leandro Fernandez replacing Pedro Henrique.
In the minute 69, Internacional's Leandro Fernandez is on target but unsuccessful.
Vinicius Lopes for Goias gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Internacional's Rodinei gets in a shot on goal at Serra Dourada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Goias throw-in in Internacional's half.
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo has run offside.
In the minute 75, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thiago Galhardo for Internacional is whistled offside.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 79, Goias's Breno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Internacional pushes forward through Victor Cuesta, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Internacional's Edenilson is whistled for offside at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 84, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Goias make their second substitution with Ratinho replacing Breno.
In the minute 88, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goias's half?
Tadeu is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 88, Breno (Goias) has received a yellow card from Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Rodrigo Moledo is on a sub for Rodinei for Internacional.
Rodrigo Moledo (Internacional) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goias have a goal kick.
Goiasâ€™s Tadeu is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
Free kick Goias.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Goias push forward at Serra Dourada and Edilson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Internacional defence.
Throw-in Internacional.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Internacional throw-in in Goias's half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Gilberto is replacing Daniel Bessa for Goias at Serra Dourada.
